components.name: Screengrab
components.description: A component responsible for capturing screenshots of mobile applications during automated testing.

components.name: ScreenshotStrategy
components.description: An interface defining various strategies for taking screenshots, allowing for different implementations based on the testing environment.

components.name: FileWritingScreenshotCallback
components.description: Handles the saving of captured screenshots to the file system, managing file paths and directories.

components.name: CleanStatusBar
components.description: A utility component that modifies the status bar appearance during screenshots to ensure a clean output.

data_flows.description: Screengrab invokes the ScreenshotStrategy to determine the method for capturing screenshots.
Once a screenshot is captured, the ScreenshotStrategy passes the image data to the FileWritingScreenshotCallback for storage.
The FileWritingScreenshotCallback may utilize CleanStatusBar to ensure the screenshot is taken without status bar artifacts.

trust_boundaries.name: User Device Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user's device and the fastlane services, ensuring that only authorized applications can interact with the fastlane components.
